description: The settings for an anchored object.

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the AnchoredObjectSetting (a Application, Document, EPSText, SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, Group, TextFrame, Button, FormField, SignatureField, TextBox, RadioButton, ListBox, ComboBox, CheckBox, MultiStateObject or ObjectStyle).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: The position of the anchored object relative to the anchor.
properties.name: anchoredPosition

properties.description: If true, the position of the anchored object is relative to the binding spine of the page or spread.
properties.name: spineRelative

properties.description: If true, prevents manual positioning of the anchored object.
properties.name: lockPosition

properties.description: If true, pins the position of the anchored object within the text frame top and bottom.
properties.name: pinPosition

properties.description: The point in the anchored object to position.
properties.name: anchorPoint

properties.description: When anchored position is above line, the position of the anchored object is relative to the text area. When anchored position is custom, the horizontal alignment of the anchored object is set by the horizontal reference point. Note: Not valid when anchored position is inline.
properties.name: horizontalAlignment

properties.description: The horizontal reference point on the page. Valid only when anchored position is custom.
properties.name: horizontalReferencePoint

properties.description: The vertical alignment of the anchored object reference point with the vertical reference point on the page. Notes: Valid only when anchored position is custom.
properties.name: verticalAlignment

properties.description: The vertical reference point on the page. Valid when anchored position is custom.
properties.name: verticalReferencePoint

properties.description: The horizontal (x) offset of the anchored object.
properties.name: anchorXoffset

properties.description: The vertical (y) offset of the anchored object. Corresponds to the space after property for above line positioning.
properties.name: anchorYoffset

properties.description: The space above an above-line anchored object.
properties.name: anchorSpaceAbove

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Inserts the anchored object into specified story.

parameters.description: The location within the story, specified as an insertion point.
parameters.name: storyOffset

parameters.description: The position of the anchored object relative to the anchor. (Optional)
parameters.name: anchoredPosition

methods.name: insertAnchoredObject

methods.description: Releases the anchored object from its associated text.
methods.name: releaseAnchoredObject

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the AnchoredObjectSetting.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

name: AnchoredObjectSetting
